languages.text: То были верные слова. Ибо ценил Он своих избранных слуг, что творили немыслимое и подносили Ему великие трофеи. Из таких был{mf||а} Домин по натуре своей, и то ведал каждый.
languages.translation_comment:
Если Триумф Герой
+1 к каунтеру DeathConfrontationSuccess

Если Триумф Герой

languages.text: Those were true words. For He valued His chosen servants, who accomplished incredible feats and brought Him great trophies. The Domin was one of them by nature, and this was known by all.
languages.original_text: То были верные слова. Ибо ценил Он своих избранных слуг, что творили немыслимое и подносили Ему великие трофеи. Из таких был{mf||а} Домин по натуре своей, и то ведал каждый.

traits.locale_text: Those were true words. For He valued His chosen servants, who did incredible deeds and brought Him great trophies. The Enim was one of them by nature, and everyone knew it.
Those were true words. For He valued His chosen servants, who did incredible deeds and brought Him great trophies. The Enim was one of them by nature, and everyone knew it.
Those were true words. For He valued His chosen servants, who accomplished incredible feats and brought Him great trophies. The Enim was one of them by nature, and this was known by all.
Those were true words. For He valued His chosen servants, who accomplished incredible feats and brought Him great trophies. The Enim was one of them by nature, and this was known by all.
Those were true words. For He valued His chosen servants, who accomplished incredible feats and brought Him great trophies. The Domin was one of them by nature, and this was known by all.
Those were true words. For He valued His chosen servants, who accomplished incredible feats and brought Him great trophies. The Domin was one of them by nature, and this was known by all.

languages.text: Das waren wahre Worte. Denn er weiß seine auserwählten Diener zu schätzen, die unglaubliche Taten vollbrachten und ihm große Trophäen brachten. {mf|Der Domin war von Natur aus einer|Die Domin war von Natur aus eine} von ihnen, und alle wussten dies.
languages.original_text: Those were true words. For He valued His chosen servants, who accomplished incredible feats and brought Him great trophies. The Domin was one of them by nature, and this was known by all.

traits.locale_text: Das waren wahre Worte. Denn er weiß seine auserwählten Diener zu schätzen, die unglaubliche Taten vollbrachten und ihm große Trophäen brachten. {mf|Der Domin war von Natur aus einer|Die Domin war von Natur aus eine} von ihnen, und alle wussten dies.

languages.text: Eran palabras verdaderas. Pues el Inmortal valora a Sus elegidos, que logran lo impensable y traen grandes trofeos. {mf|El|La} Domin se contaba entre sus filas, eso era algo sabido por todos.
languages.original_text: Those were true words. For He valued His chosen servants, who accomplished incredible feats and brought Him great trophies. The Domin was one of them by nature, and this was known by all.

traits.locale_text: Eran palabras verdaderas. Pues el Inmortal valora a Sus elegidos, que logran lo impensable y traen grandes trofeos. {mf|El|La} Domin se contaba entre sus filas, eso era algo sabido por todos.

languages.text: それは真実の言葉だった。主は自身が選んだ従者を重んじる。驚異的な偉業を成し遂げ、偉大な戦利品を齎した者を。ドミンは元よりその一人であり、そのことはすべての者が知っていた。
languages.original_text: Those were true words. For He valued His chosen servants, who accomplished incredible feats and brought Him great trophies. The Domin was one of them by nature, and this was known by all.

traits.locale_text: それは真実の言葉だった。主は自身が選んだ従者を重んじる。驚異的な偉業を成し遂げ、偉大な戦利品を齎した者を。エニムは元よりその一人であり、そのことはすべての者が知っていた。

languages.text: 这样的承诺发自真心，因为不死之神非常看重祂亲自挑选的仆人。这些仆人成就了令人难以置信的壮举，为祂带来了伟大的战利品。秘者生来就是这些神选者中的一员，这一点所有人都有目共睹。
languages.original_text: Those were true words. For He valued His chosen servants, who accomplished incredible feats and brought Him great trophies. The Domin was one of them by nature, and this was known by all.

traits.locale_text: 这样的承诺发自真心，因为不死之神非常看重祂亲自挑选的仆人。这些仆人成就了令人难以置信的壮举，为祂带来了伟大的战利品。秘者生来就是这些神选者中的一员，这一点所有人都有目共睹。

languages.text: La vérité de ses paroles était indéniable. Car Il tenait en grande estime Ses élus, qui accomplissaient d'incroyables exploits et lui rapportaient d'éminents trophées. {mf|Le|La} Domin était l'un d'entre eux par nature, et ce simple fait était connu de tous.
languages.original_text: Those were true words. For He valued His chosen servants, who accomplished incredible feats and brought Him great trophies. The Domin was one of them by nature, and this was known by all.

traits.locale_text: La vérité de ses paroles était indéniable. Car Il tenait en grande estime Ses élus, qui accomplissaient d'incroyables exploits et lui rapportaient d'éminents trophées. {mf|Le|La} Domin était l'un d'entre eux par nature, et ce simple fait était connu de tous.

languages.text: Bu sözler hakikatten ibaretti. Çünkü O, muazzam başarılara imza atarak kendisine kudretli ganimetler getiren seçilmiş hizmetkârlarına kıymet verirdi. Domin, tabiatı gereği bu hizmetkârlardan biriydi ve bu hakikati herkes bilirdi.
languages.original_text: Those were true words. For He valued His chosen servants, who accomplished incredible feats and brought Him great trophies. The Domin was one of them by nature, and this was known by all.
